headline: Is Cocoa Inflation Forcing Mondelez (MDLZ) To Rethink Its Pricing Power And Brand Playbook?
summary: In early January 2026, several analysts, including TD Cowen, Mizuho and Wells Fargo, lowered their outlook on Mondelez International, citing cocoa inflation and a tougher backdrop for consumer staples demand. At the same time, Oreo’s renewed ‘Stay Playful For All’ partnership with the NHL Players’ Association highlights Mondelez’s continued investment in brand equity and community engagement despite cost pressures. We’ll now explore how concerns about cocoa-driven margin pressure influence...
